ygData.subject: Re: My Yk!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh not impossible but very very hard. It s a pain in the ass to get the spawn broken up like you want solo. Naeeldar ... From: Dennis Gustavsson
ygData.messageBody:
Heh not impossible but very very hard. It's a pain in the ass to get the
spawn broken up like you want solo.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Dennis Gustavsson <dennis@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 10:35 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] My Yk!!!


>Grats to the ykesha Sylly.
>Always go help Necralia camp Lord...unless spawn is broken up
>real good its close to impossible to solo...trust me ..me and Vzage been
>trying to figure out a way for 2-3 months now.
>But its only possible when spawn is broken real good.
>
>/Thoul De'Seilinn 50 necro Innoruuk
>Wintir bard of the 10'th Norrath music awards
>
>James Schuldes wrote:
>
>> Hehe - yup yup! What a wild night!
>>
>> Starts out we gather in guildsay, LoD (other guild) is doing Naggy,
Mystical
>> Legends and Storm are gonna give Voxy a shot, some others (not in our
guild)
>> are heading back to PoH but most of our high levels are licking xp wounds
>> their 3 days in PoH so they opt for some xp runs meanwhile a group from
our
>> guild is camping the King on the Live side of Guk. "Hey Sylly, wanna do
>> bugs and bats with us?" Sure! Love to!!
>>
>> So we go in and clear from the 2nd bat room all the way back to the Sol-a
>> zone. (TBH - lotta stuff was cleared by the dragon raider and a prior
group
>> that got trained out so the spawn was pretty light.) We have a really
hairy
>> fight when an LDC breaks snare and scampers off. We chase him and he
agros a
>> second LDC. We get lo mana and lo hp but prevail even when one of the
party
>> was LD (link dead). After that the bug and bat spawn is real slow and a
>> call for help doing CR in Lower Live Guk comes across guildsay.
>>
>> We teleport out and go down to Guk and start CR at the zone to the live
side
>> from upper. We clear some, rez some, drag some more - a whole party of
six
>> got swarmed and a couple others were uncamping from the server crash into
>> fully populated rooms. Eventually things got cleaned up and it was right
>> before midnight. Then a shout goes out in the zone "Lord room is free if
>> you want it!" And Necralia - our 50 necro decides she wants to solo the
>> Lord - hehe.
>>
>> So our guild leader says - heck, we can come too and down we go.
Invised
>> and chasin' them across the live side. Seeing places I've died before
and
>> new ones I am sure I will soon know lots better. Scootch past the
basalts
>> and hop down by the 3 froogys on the ledge and off to the Lord room.
Hmm,
>> smaller than I was expecting and not what I woulda chose for wall paper
but
>> oh well - hehe I have arrived! I am camping the Lord!!! Just little old
me
>> 40 Bardette, 50 Necro-ette, 50 Wiz, 50 Enchanter, 49 Cleric. OMG!! I am
the
>> only tank! Well, ok Necralia's pet is a dual wielding maniac and our
>> enchanter's pet is no slouch either ;p
>>
>> Not 15 minutes into the camp, a froogy spawns in the room and he's got
>> weapon in his hand. Hmm, lots shorter than I was expecting - you'd think
a
>> Lord would be taller? Anyhow he dies real fast - hehe. (You bet I was
>> chaining him NON-STOP - that little sucker is NOT leaving this room!!!)
And
>> they loot the froogy and check the list of who needs what and my trade
>> window opens: "Here Sylly, try this!"
>>
>> So that's how I got my Yk!!!
>>
>> Sylly Songsynger
>> <The Pantheon>
>> Bard of the 40th song
>> somewhere on Innoruuk
>>
>> p.s. LoD spanked Naggy - SOL-B is horrible with 70 plus in the zone.
>>
>> p.s.s. ML and Storm got spanked by Voxxy and yielded the camp to LoD by
>> prior agreement on a certain time. LoD prolly got Voxxy and Naggy in the
>> same night.
>>
